title: Read and analyze entrypoint, user, and app files
description: Read and analyze `00_ENTRYPOINT.md`, `01_user.md`, and `02_app.md` to extract key requirements, constraints, and acceptance criteria.
acceptanceCriteria: Key requirements, constraints, and acceptance criteria are identified and documented.
verificationCommands: echo 'Manual verification: Check notes from analysis.'

title: Scaffold basic project structure
description: Scaffold the basic project structure (e.g., index.html, app.js, styles.css, worker.js) based on `02_app.md` specifications.
acceptanceCriteria: Project structure serves basic assets (HTTP 200).
Accessibility basics (e.g., ARIA presence) are considered.

title: Define core features and break into tasks
description: Define core features and break them into manageable tasks, ensuring each task has clear acceptance criteria, verification commands, and impact assessment.
acceptanceCriteria: Core features are listed and broken into tasks.

title: Generate 04_tasks.json
description: Generate `04_tasks.json` as an array of task objects, each with id, title, description, acceptanceCriteria, verificationCommands, owner, and impact.
acceptanceCriteria: `04_tasks.json` is valid JSON with all required fields.

title: Set up initial verification scripts
description: Set up initial verification scripts in `spec-kit/scripts/` (e.g., smoke_test.sh, a11y_smoke.sh) tailored to the app's needs.
acceptanceCriteria: Initial scripts run without errors.

title: Initialize 04_changelog.md
description: Initialize `04_changelog.md` with the plan start date and initial setup notes.
acceptanceCriteria: `04_changelog.md` exists with initial notes.

title: Implement core features with commenting
description: For each core feature, implement the functionality with comprehensive code commenting explaining logic, edge cases, and decisions.
acceptanceCriteria: All features pass acceptance criteria.

title: Integrate accessibility features
description: Add ARIA roles, labels, keyboard navigation, and screen reader support for all interactive elements.
acceptanceCriteria: Accessibility audits show no critical issues.

title: Develop robust testing
description: Include unit tests, integration tests, and automated tests in `spec-kit/scripts/automated_tests.sh`, covering syntax, logic, bugs, and edge cases.
acceptanceCriteria: Tests cover >90% of code paths, including edge cases.

title: Ensure performance
description: Optimize for low memory/network impact; measure with `spec-kit/scripts/perf_test.sh`.
acceptanceCriteria: Performance metrics meet thresholds (e.g., <2s load times).

title: Document thoroughly
description: Add inline comments, README updates, and API documentation for each feature.
acceptanceCriteria: Documentation is complete and accurate.

title: Run verification after each task
description: Use `spec-kit/scripts/verify.sh` to check syntax, smoke, a11y, and perf; attach reports to tasks and log in `04_changelog.md`.
acceptanceCriteria: Verification reports are generated and attached.

title: Integrate all features
description: Integrate all features into a cohesive application, resolving any conflicts or dependencies.
acceptanceCriteria: End-to-end flows work seamlessly.

title: Polish UI/UX
description: Ensure responsive design, consistent styling, and intuitive user flows with accessibility in mind.
acceptanceCriteria: UI/UX is polished and accessible.

title: Enhance testing
description: Add end-to-end tests and cross-browser checks.
acceptanceCriteria: All tests pass, including automated suites.

title: Finalize documentation
description: Compile comprehensive app documentation, troubleshooting guides, and user manuals.
acceptanceCriteria: Documentation enables easy maintenance and onboarding.

title: Conduct full verification cycle
description: Run all scripts, review reports, and iterate on any failures.
acceptanceCriteria: Full verification cycle completes successfully.

title: Update changelog
description: Update `04_changelog.md` with completion notes and any final adjustments.
acceptanceCriteria: `04_changelog.md` is updated with completion notes.

title: Set up build/deployment scripts
description: Set up build/deployment scripts if needed (e.g., for static hosting).
acceptanceCriteria: Application deploys successfully to target environment.

title: Final security review
description: Ensure no secrets in code, proper error handling.
acceptanceCriteria: No security vulnerabilities.

title: Performance optimization
description: Final tuning based on real-world metrics.
acceptanceCriteria: Performance is optimized for production.

title: Mark tasks completed
description: Mark all tasks in `04_tasks.json` as completed, with attached final reports.
acceptanceCriteria: All tasks marked completed with reports.

title: Archive spec-kit
description: Archive the spec-kit for future reference.
acceptanceCriteria: Spec-kit archived.
